author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA NOW MOVING QUICKLY WEST-NORTHWESTWARD WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
summary: ...IONA NOW MOVING QUICKLY WEST-NORTHWESTWARD WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH... As of 11:00 AM HST Thu Jul 31 the center of Iona was located near 13.2, -170.7 with movement WNW at 22 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA NOW MOVING QUICKLY WEST-NORTHWESTWARD WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH... As of 11:00 AM HST Thu Jul 31 the center of Iona was located near 13.2, -170.7 with movement WNW at 22 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Iona (CP1/CP012025)
